import React from 'react'; import './EventObj.scss'; import SlideToggle from 'react-slide-toggle'; import button from 'react'; class EventObj extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ active : true, handleToggled: "toggle", } } handleToggled = (toggle) => { this.setState({ handleToggled: toggle}) this.props.handleToggled(toggle); } render() { return (
{this.props.eventDatas.Date}
{this.props.eventDatas.Headlines}
{this.props.eventDatas.SubtitleText}
